name: Prairie Dog Evolution - Evolve Angry Mutant Farm Mutts
name_original: Prairie Dog Evolution - Evolve Angry Mutant Farm Mutts
description:
What happens to an ordinary Prairie Dog when mutations start taking place? Combine prairie dogs to evolve them and discover their most curious, exotic and bizarre forms.

>Tap to knock out other prairie dogs
>Tap again to absorb them
>Gain experience and evolve

Suggestions? Feel free to shoot us an email at support@yololabs.com!
